# Skeleton.notation property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
notation?: {
        style: 'compact-short' | 'compact-long' | 'notation-simple';
    } | {
        style: 'scientific' | 'engineering';
        expDigits?: number;
        expSign?: Skeleton['sign'];
        source?: string;
    };
```
